fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Borders and Security
head_office_address: 1455, Pennsylvania Avenue, N.W. The Willard, Suite 1225
eu_initiatives:
Emergent develops specialised products and medical countermeasures for healthcare professionals and governments to protect nations against CBRN threats.  
 
Areas of EU focus: Public health, cross-border health threats, security, medicinal products for human use, internal security, crisis management, counter-terrorism, EU CBRN Action Plan.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: As a global specialty pharmaceutical company, Emergent offers specialised products to healthcare providers and governments to address medical needs and emerging health threats.
